org.openimaj.image.feature.local.aggregate

Class SoftBagOfVisualWords<DATATYPE,DISTANCE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.feature.local.aggregate.SoftBagOfVisualWords<DATATYPE,DISTANCE>
  • Type Parameters:
    DATATYPE - Primitive array type of the ArrayFeatureVectors used by the LocalFeatures that will be processed.
    DISTANCE - Primitive array datatype for recording distances between points and cluster centroids
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    VectorAggregator<ArrayFeatureVector<DATATYPE>,SparseDoubleFV>

    public class SoftBagOfVisualWords<DATATYPE,DISTANCE>
extends Object
implements VectorAggregator<ArrayFeatureVector<DATATYPE>,SparseDoubleFV>
    Implementation of an object capable of extracting the soft-assigned Bag of Visual Words (BoVW) representation of an image given a list of local features and an SoftAssigner with an associated codebook. Soft-assignment assigns a single feature to multiple visual words, usually with some weighting for each word.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
